text: How do I get the Math equation of Python Algorithm?
ok so I am feeling a little stupid for not knowing this, but a coworker asked so I am asking here: I have written a python algorithm that solves his problem.
given x > 0 add all numbers together from 1 to x.

code:
def intsum(x):
  if x > 0:
    return x + intsum(x - 1)
  else:
    return 0

intsum(10)
55

text: first what is this type of equation is this and what is the correct way to get this answer as it is clearly easier using some other method?
